pages.text: 2|2|In kitoʙest, ki hec tardide [sakku gumone] dar [kitoʙi ilohi ʙudani] on nest va mojai hidojati parhezgoron ast
2|3|On kasone, ki [dar nihonu oskor] ʙa ƣajʙ imon dorand va namoz ʙarpo medorand va az on ci ʙa eson ruzi dodaem, infoq [sarfu xarc va xajr] mekunand
2|4|Va onhoe, ki ʙa on ci ʙar tu va [ʙar pajomʙaroni] pes az tu nozil sudaast, imon meovarand va ʙar ruzi rastoxez jaqin dorand
2|5|Onho az coniʙi Parvardigorason az hidojat ʙarxurdorand va ononad, ki rastagorand
